event.name: Using Media Design for Social Change
event.shortDescription: Join us for a virtual glimpse into the Media Design (MA) program!

description.html: Engage with Media Design faculty and students to learn more about the ways that we are designing technologies and interventions to help communities solve problems and advocate for their rights. This will be an interactive event, so come ready to share your ambitions in media, design, and improving the future. Admissions staff will also be available to answer any questions you may have about the program or application process.
